metadata.title: CVE-2022-45407 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: If an attacker loaded a font using FontFace() on a backgroundworker, a use-after-free could have occurred, leading to a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 107.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
